request.description:
This API endpoint is used to retrieve information about a specific restaurant. The endpoint makes an HTTP GET request to `localhost:6002/api/restaurant/41007428`.

The response to this request is a JSON object with the following properties:
- `_id`: The unique identifier of the restaurant.
- `title`: The name or title of the restaurant.
- `time`: The operating hours or timing of the restaurant.
- `imageUrl`: The URL of an image associated with the restaurant.
- `foods`: An array of food items available at the restaurant.
- `pickup`: A boolean value indicating if pickup service is available at the restaurant.
- `delivery`: A boolean value indicating if delivery service is available at the restaurant.
- `owner`: The owner or proprietor of the restaurant.
- `isAvailable`: A boolean value indicating if the restaurant is currently available.
- `code`: A code associated with the restaurant.
- `logoUrl`: The URL of the restaurant's logo image.
- `rating`: The rating of the restaurant.
- `ratingCount`: The number of ratings received by the restaurant.
- `coords`: An object containing geographical coordinates and address information of the restaurant. The properties of the `coords` object are:
  - `id`: The unique identifier of the coordinates.
  - `latitude`: The latitude value of the restaurant's location.
  - `longitude`: The longitude value of the restaurant's location.
  - `latitudeDelta`: The latitude delta value of the restaurant's location.
  - `longitudeDelta`: The longitude delta value of the restaurant's location.
  - `address`: The address of the restaurant.
  - `title`: The title or name of the restaurant's location.

Example response:
```
[
  {
    "_id": "",
    "title": "",
    "time": "",
    "imageUrl": "",
    "foods": [""],
    "pickup": true,
    "delivery": true,
    "owner": "",
    "isAvailable": true,
    "code": "",
    "logoUrl": "",
    "rating": 0,
    "ratingCount": "",
    "coords": {
      "id": "",
      "latitude": 0,
      "longitude": 0,
      "latitudeDelta": 0,
      "longitudeDelta": 0,
      "address": "",
      "title": ""
    }
  }
]
```

request.description:
This endpoint makes an HTTP GET request to retrieve information about a specific restaurant using its ID. The request should be made to {{Base Url}}/api/restaurant/all/41007428.

No request body is required for this endpoint.

### Response

The endpoint returns a status code of 200 and an array of objects containing details about the restaurant. Each object includes properties such as ID, title, time, image URL, owner, code, logo URL, rating, rating count, and coordinates.

Example response:

``` json
[
    {
        "_id": "",
        "title": "",
        "time": "",
        "imageUrl": "",
        "owner": "",
        "code": "",
        "logoUrl": "",
        "rating": 0,
        "ratingCount": "",
        "coords": {
            "id": "",
            "latitude": 0,
            "longitude": 0,
            "address": "",
            "title": "",
            "latitudeDelta": 0,
            "longitudeDelta": 0
        }
    }
]

 ```

request.description:
This API endpoint makes an HTTP GET request to retrieve restaurant details by its ID. The request should include the restaurant ID in the URL path. The response will contain information such as the restaurant's location coordinates, available foods, pickup and delivery options, availability status, title, operating hours, image URLs, owner details, rating, and other related attributes.

The last execution of this request returned a 200 status code along with a JSON response containing the restaurant details, including its coordinates, availability, title, operating hours, image URLs, owner details, rating, and other related attributes.

Example response:

``` json
{
    "coords": {
        "id": "2022",
        "latitude": 37.787503258917035,
        "longitude": -122.39854938269353,
        "address": "333 O'Farrell St, San Francisco, CA 94102, United States",
        "title": "La Foods",
        "latitudeDelta": 0.0122,
        "longitudeDelta": 0.0221
    },
    "foods": [],
    "pickup": true,
    "delivery": true,
    "isAvailable": true,
    "_id": "6530eb66c9e72013e5b65931",
    "title": "La Foods",
    "time": "11:00 AM - 9:00 PM",
    "imageUrl": "https://d326fntlu7tb1e.cloudfront.net/uploads/5c2a9ca8-eb07-400b-b8a6-2acfab2a9ee2-image001.webp",
    "owner": "fgdgdfgd",
    "code": "41007428",
    "logoUrl": "https://d326fntlu7tb1e.cloudfront.net/uploads/dd7adef9-1527-4b61-81f0-320afb5a884f-kfc.png",
    "rating": 5,
    "ratingCount": "5666",
    "__v": 0
}

 ```

request.description:
This endpoint allows you to add items to the cart by making an HTTP POST request to localhost:6003/api/cart. The request should include a JSON payload in the raw request body type with the following parameters:

- "instructions" (string): Instructions for the item
- "productId" (string): ID of the product
- "additives" (array of strings): List of additives for the product
- "quantity" (number): Quantity of the product
- "totalPrice" (number): Total price of the product
    

### Example Request

``` json
{
    "instructions": "Some instructions here",
    "productId": "12345",
    "additives": ["sugar", "milk"],
    "quantity": 2,
    "totalPrice": 10.99
}

 ```

### Response

Upon successful execution, the endpoint returns a status code of 201 and a JSON response with the following fields:

- "status" (boolean): Indicates the status of the operation
- "count" (number): Number of items in the cart
    

### Example Response

``` json
{
    "status": true,
    "count": 3
}

 ```

Add documentation

request.description:
# Get Default Address

This endpoint retrieves the default address for a user.

## Request

### HTTP Request
`GET http://localhost:6003/api/address/default`

## Response

- `200 OK` The request was successful.

Example response:
```json
{
    "_id": "656375b39ef6581e75723247",
    "userId": "6534d5a5e8f831be96f4697f",
    "addressLine1": "132 Geary Street",
    "city": "San Francisco",
    "state": "California",
    "district": "Union Square",
    "postalCode": "94108",
    "default": true,
    "country": "USA",
    "deliveryInstructions": "Main entrance, ask for reception.",
    "__v": 0
}
```

request.description:
# Get All Addresses

This endpoint retrieves all addresses associated with the user.

## Request

### HTTP Request

`GET http://localhost:6003/api/address/all`

## Response

- Status: 200 OK
    

Example response body:

``` json
[
    {
        "_id": "",
        "userId": "",
        "addressLine1": "",
        "city": "",
        "state": "",
        "district": "",
        "postalCode": "",
        "default": true,
        "country": "",
        "deliveryInstructions": "",
        "__v": 0
    }
]

 ```

### Response Body

- `_id` (string): The unique identifier for the address.
- `userId` (string): The user ID associated with the address.
- `addressLine1` (string): The first line of the address.
- `city` (string): The city of the address.
- `state` (string): The state of the address.
- `district` (string): The district of the address.
- `postalCode` (string): The postal code of the address.
- `default` (boolean): Indicates if it is the default address.
- `country` (string): The country of the address.
- `deliveryInstructions` (string): Any specific delivery instructions.
- `__v` (number): Version control field.

    }
]

request.description:
This API endpoint allows you to submit a new rating for a product. The HTTP POST request should be sent to [http://localhost:6003/api/rating](http://localhost:6003/api/rating) with the required payload in the raw request body.

### Request Body

- `ratingType`: (string) The type of rating.
- `product`: (string) The product for which the rating is being submitted.
- `rating`: (number) The actual rating value.
    

### Response

Upon successful execution, the API returns a status code of 200 along with the following response body:

- `status`: (boolean) Indicates the status of the operation.
- `message`: (string) A message providing additional information about the operation.
    

Example:

``` json
{
    "status": true,
    "message": ""
}

 ```

# Rating API

This API endpoint allows you to retrieve the rating for a specific product, based on the product ID and rating type.

## Request

### Endpoint

`GET` [http://localhost:6003/api/rating](http://localhost:6003/api/rating)

### Query Parameters

- `product` (string, required): The ID of the product for which the rating is to be retrieved.
- `ratingType` (string, required): The type of rating to be retrieved, e.g., "Restaurant".
    

## Response

- `status` (boolean): Indicates the status of the request, where `true` signifies success and `false` signifies failure.
- `message` (string): Provides additional information about the status of the request.
    

### Examples of Response

#### Success Response

``` json
{
    "status": true,
    "message": ""
}

 ```

#### Failure Response

``` json
{
    "status": false,
    "message": "User has not rated this restaurant yet."
}

 ```

response.name: Rating Response
